mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Shady Lane" and "Dance Your Troubles Away" ROUND DANCES "Ranger Polka" and "Matinee Waltz" SPECIAL FEATURES "The Indian Influence on Square Dance Fashions", "Square Dancing Store Windows", "A Clubhouse All Our Own", "The 5th National Convention", "Style Series - Star Figures", "The Caller and Musicians". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
